results.title: Simvastatin prevents morphine-induced tolerance and dependence in mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (5 and 10mg/kg) attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Morphine_Dependence</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009021 @@@morphine dependence@@@ as indicated by a less severe antagonist-precipitated @DISEASE_Substance_Withdrawal_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D013375 @@@withdrawal syndrome@@@.
